typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as short,
		country as string,
		state as string,
		city as string,
		station as string,
		last_update as timestamp,
		pollutant_id as string,
		pollutant_min as integer,
		pollutant_max as integer,
		pollutant_avg as integer,
		pollutant_unit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> pollutiondatacsv
